#text=My car had broken down so I needed to take the public bus to work on Wednesday morning .
#text=First I looked on-line to see which bus I should take to get to McLean , and what bus stop was the closest to my home .
#text=The instructions were to go to Seven Corners shopping center , catch the 3A to Tyson Corner , and then transfer to the 18A to get within a block of my office .
#text=In the morning I walked up to the shopping center and waited until the bus came .
#text=I got on , paying the driver with change and dollar bills .
#text=I confirmed with the driver that this was the correct bus to go to Tyson Corner and transfer .
#text=I chose a seat near the front so I could make sure I did not miss my next stop .
#text=I transferred at Tyson Corner to the 18A , which took me within a block of my work place .
